mapper.select: select count(*) FROM io as theio left join student_epc se on theio.epc=se.epc left join student as stu on stu.id=se.student_id where stu.id= #{studentId}
mapper.insert: insert into io ( epc, io_type, io_date, student_id, rfid_id ) values ( #{epc}, #{ioType}, #{ioDate}, #{studentId}, #{rfidId} )
